articles.content: Shares of Piramal Enterprises fell 2.47 percent at open on November 10, a day after the financial services company posted a Q2 profit of Rs 48 crore in Q2FY24, against a loss of Rs 1,536 in the previ… [+1867 chars]

articles.author: Ankita Chakravarti
articles.title: Fake Flipkart, Amazon websites targeting Diwali shoppers, warns cyber researchers - India Today
articles.description: Surge in phishing campaigns targeting Diwali shoppers identified by CloudSEK researchers
articles.content: As the Diwali festivities light up, there's a dark side lurking online. CloudSEK's cyber researchers have unearthed a surge in sneaky online scams preying on the festive cheer. These shady schemes ar… [+2861 chars]
